text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?
text.Response A: I think I can help you with that. But I need to know what kind of phone you have.
text.Response B: To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.

meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

378.displayed_text:
Prompt

Can you tell me how to turn off bold text on an iphone?

Response A

I think I can help you with that. But I need to know what kind of phone you have.

Response B

To turn off bold text on an iPhone, go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Bold Text and turn off the switch.
